Package alfdozen.es_2023_2sem_terca_teira_leipl_grupoa

Class ControllerOverlayed

java.lang.Object
alfdozen.es_2023_2sem_terca_teira_leipl_grupoa.ControllerOverlayed
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ControllerOverlayed extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Overlayed class is a JavaFX controller that manages the GUI components and events in a scene that displays information about overlapping and overcrowded lectures in a schedule. It provides two ListViews to display overlapping and overcrowded lectures and has methods to change scenes and initialize the contents of the ListViews. Implements the Initializable interface to initialize the contents of the ListViews when the corresponding FXML file is loaded.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
alfdozen

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. It clears the contents of both ListView objects and checks if there are any overlapping lectures or overcrowded lectures in the current schedule. If there are overlapping lectures, it adds them to the "overlayedList" ListView. If there are overcrowded lectures, it adds them to the "overlappedList" ListView. If either ListView is empty, it adds a message indicating that there are no overlapping or overcrowded lectures.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      arg0 - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object or null if the location is not known.
      arg1 - The resources used to localize the root object or null if the root object was not localized.

    • addLectureToOverlayedAndOverlapped

      private void addLectureToOverlayedAndOverlapped(Lecture lec1, Lecture lec2)
      Adds the given lectures to the overlayed and overlapped lists if they overlap or if one of them is overcrowded. If the lectures overlap, their string representation is added to the overlayed list if it is not already there. If one of the lectures is overcrowded, its string representation with the suffix " - Sobrelotada" is added to the overlapped list if it is not already there.
      Parameters:
      lec1 - the first lecture
      lec2 - the second lecture
